title: New: Prehistoric Forest – Good Time
content: Having taken their demo EP down from their Bandcamp page (although it’s still available on their Soundcloud), New Jersey’s Prehistoric Forest are truly in ‘album prepping mode’. Exploding onto these pages with their fantastic debut single back in February, the quintet returned with the slower paced Your Move midway through June, and have now followed that up with the absolutely brilliant Good Time. As with The Dark Ages, it’s another slice of early Strokes inspired rock and roll. Check out both Good Time and Your Move below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
